clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Apatinib in Metastatic Esophageal Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Study of Apatinib in Metastatic Esophageal Cancer：A Open Label, Randomized Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of apatinib in Metastatic Esophageal Cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: Eligible patients will receive apatinib treatment until disease progression or intolerable toxicity or patients withdrawal of consent after the failure of chemotherapy or radiotherapy.

arm_group.description: Apatinib Mesylate Tablets 500 mg qd p.o. after the failure of chemotherapy or radiotherapy
Apatinib Mesylate Tablets 750 mg qd p.o. after the failure of chemotherapy or radiotherapy
